events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for further evaluation.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening and are impressed with your software development experience.
Thank you for the update. I am excited to proceed and available for the next steps in the interviewing process.
Your technical interview is scheduled for May 16 at 10 AM UTC with our lead developer.
The technical interview was successfully completed. Your problem-solving skills were highly noted.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 20 at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the team appreciated your approach to collaboration and communication.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position to you.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer and the interview process overall.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to have you join our engineering team.
The onboarding process has begun. Welcome! We look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
The hiring process for the software engineering position is now closed with your successful onboarding.
